name: HOODOO GURUS - PURITY OF ESSENCE
description:
The latest - and unquestionably - greatest album by the Hoodoo Gurus has been released by 100% Music. Hitting the Top 20 in their native Australia and featuring the hit singles 'Crackin Up' and 'I Hope You're Happy' - 'Purity Of Essence' is the 9th album by the band and boasts a massive 16 tracks.
  • "A rousingly diverse set - sleek, hook-filled melodies; propulsive rhythms; heart on sleeve lyrics; terrific singing." - Rock's Back Pages
  • "Bravo - possibly the four-piece's finest" - Rave Magazine
  • "Expertly created" - Blogcritics
  • "Hooks and refrains that leap out of the speakers" - M
  • "Yet another jewel in the Gurus' crown" - Rock And Roll Report
01 - Crackin' Up 02 - A Few Home Truths 03 - Are You Sleeping ? 04 - Burnt Orange 05 - I Hope You're Happy 06 - Ashamed Of Me 07 - What's In It For Me ? 08 - Over Nothing 09 - You've Got Another Thing Coming 10 - Only In America 11 - Somebody Take Me Home 12 - Let Me In 13 - Evening Shade 14 - Why So Sad ? 15 - 1968 16 - The Stars Look Down OHPM 009 CD release - 16 page booklet - unique UK layout The band play O2 Shepherds Bush Empire, London on Sunday 3rd October. The album is also available digitally via iTunes.

name: POWER OF DREAMS - 20TH ANNIVERSARY DOUBLE CD - IMMIGRANTS EMIGRANTS AND ME
description:
*  "Jesus f***ing Christ. 20 years ? Christ that's depressing" - Ian O'Doherty - Irish Independant
    * "Power Of Dreams were a genius band who should have been massive, Craig has it going on even now" - Alan McGee
    * "Excellent news" - Gideon Coe - 6 Music
    * "Jesus, 20 years!!! It is one of my favourite albums of all time!" - Tower Records
    * "So thrilled to hear that brilliant album will be available again" - Irish Echo
    * "Brilliant, I never got to see the band back in the day !" - RTE 2 - Dan Hegarty

Yes ! Immigrants, Emigrants and Me is 20 years old in 2010 and the original lineup of Power of Dreams have reformed for a tour with the album remastered, revised artwork and a whopping 20 track bonus CD !

The landmark debut album by Power of Dreams was released in 1990, receiving glowing reviews worldwide with Craig Walker garnering praise for a lyrical maturity beyond his 18 years and the band’s spiky indie pop assault winning fans among press and public alike.

With a revised and expanded booklet - and a remastered bonus 20 track CD collecting every recording associated with the album - many on CD for the first time - the 20th Anniversary CD is a must for music fans and a triumph of a reissue.

CD 1 - Immigrants, Emigrants And Me

01 - The Jokes On Me
02 - Talk
03 - Does It Matter
04 - Much Too Much
05 - Had You Listened
06 - Stay
07 - Never Told You

08 - Bring You Down

19 - Break On Through [Live]
20 - Cancer [Claustrophobia Mix]

OHPM 008

name: 100% MUSIC - £ 5 BUMPER CD BUNDLE - RELEASES 001->007
description: The first 7 releases on 100% Music for a fiver !! 9 CDs in total. This is what you're looking at : OHPM 007 - The Circus Sands - Dr Death EP * At last the south has an answer to The Arctic Monkeys - Observer * Excellent - I love it - The Mag * Definitely a band going places - Alter The Press * Think Kings of Leon at their most punchy crossed with The Cribs infectious hooks - The Playground * A convincing, confident sound - Record of the Day - UK Industry Bible * Get out your flying V air guitars - BBC 6 Music * Sizzling sleaze rock with an Exile On Main Street vibe - Bugbear * If dirty, grimy, scuzzy rock 'n ' roll is the drug, Dr Death shall administer - Linda Serck, BBC OHPM 006 - Her:Enemy - Hold On To Something - Album * The sound of the summer - Playground * 5 / 5 - Black Velvet * Instantly likeable - Rocksound * Top-drawer energetic hard rock - Rockmidgets * Big choruses.. full of menace - Punktastic OHPM 005 - The Charlie Parkers - If You Knew - EP * The Charlie Parkers are classic British tunesmiths following in the footsteps of The Beatles, Kinks, Bowie, Smiths and Libertines - NME * Guitar shaped loveliness - Channel4.com OHPM 004 - Atom Gang - I See Said The Blind Man - Album * Album Of The Year - 5/5 - Punktastic * Top 10 band for 2009 - Big Cheese * An exciting record full of hooks and catchy riffs - Rockmidgets * Outstanding album - Issue * This album is full of good hooks, some poppy tracks and a whole array of styles ensuring the listener will never become bored, watch out Radio 1! - Sin Radio OHPM 003 - 100% Tent 17 track compilation album OHPM 002 - 100% Reading 37 Track compilation album - double CD OHPM 001 - 100% Basingstoke 38 Track compilation album - double CD
